title: K'ANYINYE CHINEKE EKELE (THANK YOU, LORD GOD)
author: Traditional Igbo liturgical chant
source: Not listed on hymnary.org (regional Igbo liturgical hymn; verify with local sources)

sections.title: Verse 1
content: Bianu wet ih'onyinye k'anyi nye Chineke
Bianu wet ih'onyinye k'anyi ny'okaka b'Onye amara

sections.title: Verse 2
content: Chineke Onye ker'uwa cho ya mma
Cho ya mma nye umu gi
Otito nile diri gi, Ekele nile diri gi
Nna dalu, O dalu, O I meka

sections.title: Verse 3
content: Mmadu loo n'obigi chee ihe d'ich'iche
Mmadu loo n'obi gi mar'ihe ig'eme
K'ihu amara na ihe ebube nke Eze Otito

sections.title: Verse 4
content: Nna nara oru ekele gozikwa anyi nile,
O Nna nara oru ekele gozikwa umu gi
Bu ndi I mere ka ha buru ndi ama n'iso uzo G1.
